doc:
Katharine Balfour https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katharine_Balfour 0 Katharine Balfour (February 7, 1921 – April 3, 1990) was an American actress and writer. Her best-known role was as the mother of Oliver, Ryan O'Neal's character, in the 1970 film Love Story, as well as Sophia Kebabian in America, America and was host of a radio talk show, Views in Brief, on WEVD in New York. Katharine_Balfour ( February_7_,_1921 – April_3_,_1990 ) was an_American_actress_and_writer .
